doc.name: IfThen
doc.description:
A type polymorphic If-Then-Else actor.

In an iteration, if an input token is available at the If input, that token is read. The Then output is set to true, if then If input is true. The Else output is set to true, if then If input is false. The If port may only receive Tokens of type Boolean. The output ports are also of type boolean.

IfThen is a ControlActor, meaning that it keeps a list of enabled output ports.
doc.author: Elizabeth Latronico (Bosch)
doc.port: The input port. The type can only be BOOLEAN.
